top.end: If this card is covered, delete this card.

effects.middle: Play the top card of your deck face down in each line where you have a card.
Flip a card. Flip a card.
Draw 1 card. You MAY flip 1 face down card.

effects.bottom: When this card would be covered: Play the top card of your deck face-down in another line.

effects.middle: If this card is covering a card, draw 1 card.
You discard 1 card.
Flip 1 card. Draw cards equal to that card's value.
Draw 2 cards. Reveal 1 face down card. You may shift OR flip that card.
Shift all face down cards in this line to another line.
Your opponent reveals their hand.
You discard 1 card.
Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards 2 cards, then reveals their hand.

effects.top: Your opponent can only play cards face-down.

effects.middle: Your opponent discards 2 cards. Rearrange their protocols.
Your opponent discards 1 card. Shift 1 of their cards.

effects.bottom: End: You may return 1 of your opponent's cards. If you do, flip this card.

effects.middle: You discard 1 card.
Play 1 card.

effects.top: After you clear cache: Draw 1 card.
effects.middle: Draw 2 cards.

effects.top: When this card would be deleted by compiling: Shift this card instead, even if this card is covered.

effects.middle: Shift 1 of your other cards.
effects.bottom: End: you may shift one of your cards. If you do, flip this card.

effects.middle: Shift one of your opponent's face down cards.
You discard 1 card.
For every 2 cards in this line, play the top card of your deck face down under this card.
Draw 2 cards. Shift 1 card either to or from this line.
Flip 1 card. Shift that card to this line.
Shift 1 face down card to this line.
You discard 1 card.
Your opponent plays the top card of their deck face down in this line.
Flip 1 other card. Flip this card.
Play the top card of your deck face-down in each other line.
Draw 2 cards. Rearrange your protocols.
Return all cards with a value of 2 in one line.
You discard 1 card.
Draw 3 cards. Shift one of your opponent's covered cards.
Flip 1 of your opponent's cards. You MAY shift that card.

effects.top: All face down cards in this stack have a value of 4.
effects.middle: You may flip 1 covered card in this line.
Play 1 card face down in another line.

effects.bottom: When this card would be covered: First delete the lowest value covered card in this line.

effects.middle: You discard 1 card.
Draw the top card of your opponent's deck.
effects.bottom: End: You may give 1 card from your hand to your opponent. If you do, draw 2 cards.

effects.middle: Your opponent draws 1 card. Refresh.
Take 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Give 1 card from your hand to your opponent.
Reveal 1 card from your hand. Flip 1 card.
You discard 1 card.
Your opponent draws 2 cards.
Delete 1 card.
Discard 3 cards. Delete 1 card. Delete 1 card.

effects.top: Delete your highest value uncovered card. Delete your opponent's highest value uncovered card.
After you delete cards: Draw 1 card.

effects.bottom: When this card would be covered: First delete the lowest value covered card in this line.

effects.middle: You discard 1 card.
Delete 1 card from each other line.

effects.top: Start: you may draw 1 card. If you do, delete 1 other card, then delete this card.

effects.middle: Delete all cards in 1 line with values of 1 or 2.
Delete 1 face down card.

effects.bottom: Delete a card with a value of 0 or 1.

effects.middle: You discard 1 card.

effects.top: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face down card in this line.

effects.middle: Flip all other face up cards in this line.

effects.top: Ignore all middle commands on cards in this line.
effects.bottom: When this card would be covered: First flip this card.

effects.middle: Flip one of your opponents face up cards.
You may flip 1 of your face up covered cards.
You discard 1 card.

effects.top: Your opponent's total value in this line is reduced by 2.
effects.middle: Flip 1 card.
Draw 2 cards. Your opponent cannot compile next turn.
effects.bottom: Start: Either discard 1 card or flip this card.

effects.top: Your opponent cannot play cards face down in this line.

effects.middle: Draw 1 card. Delete all cards in 1 other line with 8 or more cards.
Return 1 of your cards.
You discard 1 card.

effects.top: When this card would be covered or flipped: First, delete this card.

effects.middle: Your opponent discards 1 card.
effects.bottom: Your opponent cannot play cards in this line.

effects.top: After your opponent discards cards: Draw 1 card.
effects.middle: Your opponent discards 1 card.
Discard 1 or more cards. Your opponent discards the amount of cards discarded plus 1.
Flip every other uncovered face up card.

effects.bottom: End: Your opponent deletes 1 of their face down cards. You may flip this card.

effects.middle: You discard 1 card.
Refresh. Draw 1 card.

effects.top: When you play cards face up, they may be played without matching protocols.
effects.middle: Draw 2 cards.
effects.bottom: Start: Either discard 1 card or flip this card.

effects.middle: You may flip 1 card.

effects.top: After you draw cards: You may shift this card, even if this card is covered.

effects.middle: Swap the positions of 2 of your protocols.
You discard 1 card.
Draw 3 cards.
Flip 1 other card. Draw 2 cards.
effects.bottom: When this card would be covered: First draw 1 card and flip 1 other card.

effects.middle: Discard 1 card. If you do, delete 1 card.
Discard 1 card. If you do, return 1 card.

effects.bottom: End: You may discard 1 card. If you do, flip 1 card.

effects.middle: Discard 1 or more cards. Draw the amount discarded plus 1.
You discard 1 card.
Draw 3 cards.
